TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A surgeon who specializes in operating on tumors found inside the chest.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "thoracic surgical oncologist"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cirujano que se especializa en operar tumores que se encuentran en el interior del pecho.
